title: Samsung February 2022 security update is now rolling out for these Galaxy devices
content:
After a great start to the new year update schedule, Samsung has started rolling out the February 2022 security update to selected Galaxy devices from January 28. Here’s every device that has been updated so far.

more…

The post Samsung February 2022 security update is now rolling out for these Galaxy devices appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Samsung is rolling out the February 2022 security update, the second of the year, to many of its phones and tablets; here's the full list.
